body_content.explanation: a product or service that is sold at a lower than usual price in order encourage people to buy or use it, or the act of offering goods and services in this way:
examples: He was clever at finding bargains, reporting back to her about the special offers, the cheaper lines.
From time to time there are special offers on sofas.
I took a trip round the supermarket to see what was on special offer.

body_content.explanation: something extra or free that is offered in order to encourage people to buy or use a particular product or service, or the act of offering something in this way:
examples: Some dealers have special offers such as free servicing for up to two years.
We are making a special offer to anyone who signs up for this course before the end of February.
